DOC.HEADLINE: YVES NAVARRE ; AWARD-WINNING FRENCH WRITER
DOC.TEXT: Yves Navarre , 53 , one of France ' s leading contemporary writers . Navarre , who had lived for many years in Canada , wrote more_than two_dozen novels , several plays and children ' s books.Open about his homosexuality , he frequently explored the subject in his writings but disliked being described as a homosexual writer . In 1991 he wrote a love_story dealing with AIDS , " Friends Gone With the Wind. " Navarre won France ' s top literary prize , the Goncourt , in 1980 for his novel " Le Jardin d ' Acclimatation " ( " The Zoological Garden " ) , and in 1992 was honored for his body_of_work by the prestigious French_Academy .
